name: epick.co.uk
overview: epick.co.uk, your home for furnishings. We are one of the most prevailing UK’s online flat packed furniture and household items retailer. We are providing fantastic ranges of flat packed furniture, shelving and storage solution and household items at everyday low prices. At epick.co.uk you are guaranteed not to be bombarded with any hidden delivery charges. The only price you pay is the price displayed on our website. Did you know epick.co.uk is a not for profit organisation. epick.co.uk is owned and operated by New Start Highland Ltd., the Scottish Environment Protection Agency Award for Excellence in Environmental Sustainability in 2012 and the Best contribution to a “Greener” Scotland through the use of European Structural Funds 2010 social enterprise. The company for the past 11 years has helped to transform the lives of thousands of people by providing the vital support needed when we encounter those suffering hardship, severe challenge or crisis in the community. epick.co.uk was launched to support the great work of New Start Highland. We are proud to be a part of this great organisation. Everyone at epick.co.uk share the same hopes and desires to make our community is a better place by helping people in it.
